channel.title: Need help defining something

item.title: Need help defining something
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“RSCDevil, post:4, topic:548185”][quote author=yong min link=topic=667091.msg4460890#msg4460890 date=1417501074]
Try:

playerArray[i2].admin

[/quote]

ty yong this worked!

i tried doing playerArray.admin before but it said variable admin was not defined. Guess I just needed the [i2][/quote]

No problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help defining something
item.dc:creator: @RSCDevil RSCDevil
item.description:
@RSCDevil wrote:

Hello all,

I am trying to show player ranks when right clicking a player

Example:
when right clicking a admin it will show:
#adm# duel (player name)
#adm# trade (player name)
#adm# follow (player name)

My code is very close minus one little aspect. I tried using ourPlayer.admin but that just shows your current player rank that your logged into on another player when right clicking them. I need it to be the players rank that your right clicking showing on their name.

heres my code:

menuText1[menuLength] = "Duel with"; if (ourPlayer.admin == 3) { menuText2[menuLength] = "@whi@#adm#" + playerArray[i2].name + s; } else if (ourPlayer.admin == 2) { menuText2[menuLength] = "@whi@#mod#" + playerArray[i2].name + s; } else if (ourPlayer.admin == 1) { menuText2[menuLength] = "@whi@#pmd#" + playerArray[i2].name + s; } else if (ourPlayer.admin == 0) { menuText2[menuLength] = "@whi@" + playerArray[i2].name + s; } menuActionX[menuLength] = playerArray[i2].currentX; menuActionY[menuLength] = playerArray[i2].currentY; menuID[menuLength] = 2806; menuActionType[menuLength] = playerArray[i2].serverIndex; menuLength++;

Read full topic
